H0.text: What title was given to the eldest son of a Russian Czar. Grand Duke

H1.text: What title was given to the eldest son of a Russian Czar. Tsarevsky

H2.text: What title was given to the eldest son of a Russian Czar. Prince Imperial

H3.text: What title was given to the eldest son of a Russian Czar. Czarevitch

A4.text: Under the 1797 Pauline house laws, the title was discontinued and replaced with tsesarevich for the heir apparent alone.

A5.text: The younger brothers were given the title of veliky knyaz, translated as grand prince or, more commonly, as grand duke.
